name: Neon Nightmares
description:
Neon Nightmares is an 80's Neon themed top down survival shooter. You will have to fend off the ever increasing amount of enemies trying to swarm you. Defeat these enemies, collect crystals to level up and upgrade your character.

How to Play

W, A, S, D - to move around
SPACE- to dash
TAB- to open up the level up screen
LMB - hold to shoot

Survive and good luck!
